Text: Some nice uploads - Just a massive shame that you have to include that STUPID logo across all of the artwork. !!!!!!

mrsjs

"why should I see the artwork".

Well to answer that question. I like to have the artwork present on my iPod or my MAC screen. I'm sure that lots of other people do too. What most uploaders do is to present artwork with out a "watermark" or as I like to call it "scent markings". I think they are only put on so the uploader can see their name in lights.

I could find and download the correct, unadulterated artwork and replace yours, but it takes time and a modicum of effort.

Don't get me wrong, I appreciate your uploads except for the dumb logo plastered over every single piece of artwork !!!

I understand that but i put watermark coz there are other people who copy and put there name instead of the orignal ripper name without giving any credits so i have to put it.

Thanks

mrsjs
You can put your logo in a corner with 50% opacity.

thanks
